overview: An animated propaganda film depicting the curiosities of Ukrainization in the 1920s in a satirical form.  It was prepared in the animation workshop of VUFKU in the spring of 1927 under the leadership of Levandovsky as his third work using paper dolls after "The Tale of the Straw Bull" and "The Tale of the Squirrel-Housewife and the Mouse-Villain" and was not planned for wide release.  The film is lost.
title: Ukrainization
